snippet: Time Warner, the media conglomerate, wants angry Knicks and Rangers fans to know that it is Time Warner Cable that is in a dispute with Madison Square Garden's MSG network.
abstract: Time Warner, the media conglomerate, wants angry Knicks and Rangers fans to know that it is Time Warner Cable that is in a dispute with Madison Square Garden's MSG network.

headline.main: Sports Fans Are Having Trouble Keeping Their Time Warners Straight
